name: nucleus
description: Nucleus: The core of your server

scripts.dev: rm -rf dist && eslint src --fix && pnpm build && node --experimental-json-modules --enable-source-maps dist/index.js
scripts.force-dev: clear; rm -rf dist; tsc-suppress && pnpm copy-files && node --experimental-json-modules --enable-source-maps dist/index.js
scripts.lint: echo 'Style checking...'; prettier --check .; echo 'Linting...'; eslint src; echo 'To auto-fix everything possible, please run `pnpm lint-fix`'; true
scripts.lint-no-stylecheck: echo 'Linting...'; eslint src; echo 'A full lint and style check is required for PRs to be accepted. Please run `pnpm lint` before committing'; true
scripts.lint-fix: echo 'Fixing eslint issues...'; eslint src --fix; echo 'Reformatting...'; prettier --write --loglevel warn --cache .; true
scripts.lint-list: echo 'Style checking...'; prettier --check .; echo 'Linting...'; eslint src; echo 'To view errors in more detail, please run `pnpm lint`'; true
scripts.lint-ci: echo 'Style checking...' && prettier --check . && echo 'Linting...' && eslint src
scripts.setup: npm i -g pnpm | pnpm | pnpm build | node Installer.js
scripts.win-force-build: clear | rm -r dist | tsc-suppress | pnpm copy-files
scripts.win-lint-fix: echo 'Fixing eslint issues...' | eslint src --fix | echo 'Reformatting...' | prettier --write --loglevel warn --cache . | true

author: Clicks
